name: Finger Blasters
description:
A modern-day tongue-in-cheek twist on a classic arcade shooter.

Shoot the waves of bad kitties to earn points, before they shoot you.
As the levels progress, the bad kitties move faster and they shoot more missiles and fire them more frequently.

Points are earned differently whether the bad kitty is in formation or diving.

A bonus life is given every 20000pts.

This game implements a "Watch an Ad for more game credits" system. You are given 10 credits to start. 1 credit = 1 game (Like in an arcade). When you have run out of credits... watch a reward-ad to gain 5 credits.
